title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, I don't understand what this message means.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open a binary project and press F4 on a selection from the project (e.g. org.apache.ant).
